items.title: Integrate mapbox to display nearby custom pins
items.descriptionPreview:
Problem Description
Integrate map-box to display nearby custom location pins based on a suburb address.

Acceptance Criteria
Mapbox should be displayed on all location pages.
A custom pin should be created for all centres (approx 2k) based on their address. this data will be provided in a json.
Mapbox should be zoomed into show nearby pins based on the location of the page. ie. Adelaide page should show Adelaide pins on initial mapbox load
Each centre should have a static image of the map zoomed into the specific location saved a json file.
When a user clicks on a pin show a pop up with custom pin name, description and link to contact. (I will provide this data in a json file)
Submit a PR within existing codebase which you'll have access to.

items.title: OAuth discord bot
items.descriptionPreview:
Problem Description
I need a discord bot that uses the "Join servers for you" permission on discord to add people to servers using a join-server command that only the owner of the bot can use I need to get people to accept the permission with an embed that says custom text that is sent using a command. I also need a check member command to see if someone is in the list of people who accepted the permission.

TL;DR:
4 commands
!join-perm (sends embed with link for accepted discord's "join servers for you" permission)
!join-server {Member Ammount} {Server ID} (Joins the server with the members who accepted)
!check member {ID} (check if member has accepted permission)
!net-stats (Show the number of total available users)

Acceptance Criteria
Lots of NodeJS and discord experience

TO GET ACCEPTED PUT YOUR DISCORD NAME AND TAG IN REQUEST!!!
